name: insertGlyphs(_:length:forStartingGlyphAt:characterIndex:)
desc: Inserts the given glyphs into the glyph cache and maps them to the specified characters.Required.
declaration:
func insertGlyphs(_ glyphs: UnsafePointer<NSGlyph>, 
           length: Int, 
forStartingGlyphAt glyphIndex: Int, 
   characterIndex charIndex: Int)
